com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.test.conformance

Class ConformanceScopeResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.test.conformance.ConformanceScopeResolver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ScopeResolver

    public class ConformanceScopeResolver
extends java.lang.Object
implements ScopeResolver
    ConformanceScopeResolver implements com.att.research.xacml.pdp.ScopeResolver for the conformance tests using a fixed set of hierarchical resources defined in a map.
    Version:
    $Revision$
    Author:
    car

      void add(java.net.URI identifierRoot, java.net.URI identifierChild) 
      ScopeResolverResult resolveScope(Attribute attributeResourceId, ScopeQualifier scopeQualifier)
      Examines the given Attribute representing a resource identifier for a hierarchical resource and returns an Iterator over a set of Attributes representing individual resource identifiers that are part of the requested hierarchy as specified by the ScopeQualifier.

      • resolveScope

        public ScopeResolverResult resolveScope(Attribute attributeResourceId,
                               ScopeQualifier scopeQualifier)
                                 throws ScopeResolverException
        Description copied from interface: ScopeResolver
        Examines the given Attribute representing a resource identifier for a hierarchical resource and returns an Iterator over a set of Attributes representing individual resource identifiers that are part of the requested hierarchy as specified by the ScopeQualifier.
        Specified by:
        resolveScope in interface ScopeResolver
        Parameters:
        attributeResourceId - the Attribute for the resource identifier
        scopeQualifier - the ScopeQualifier determining which nodes are returned
        Returns:
        a ScopeResolverResult with the results of the request
        Throws:
        ScopeResolverException - if there is an error resolving the resource identifier to a scope.
